data.description:
GRAB is a multiplayer parkour game. Climb, jump, slide and swing through the levels to reach the end, but don't fall or touch the lava!
A core component of GRAB is the level editor that lets you and your friends create your own levels together and upload them for everyone else to play.

Features:
- Active and fun physics based controls
- Play with up to 12 players in cross platform multiplayer
- Built-in level editor that lets you build levels together with your friends in multiplayer with quick switching between testing and editing
- Download levels made by the community and upload your own
- OVER 350000 Community levels! More every day!

GRAB is currently in EARLY ACCESS! This means that while it is already fun to play, it is far from finished. A lot of planned features are still missing or incomplete and there may be some bugs and crashes.

changelog.change_log:
- The amount of levels and players asking for tips has gotten a bit out of hand and as a result I updated the community guidelines to no longer allow asking for tips in any way. Any new cases after this update will get warnings or bans. Levels that already did it before will be removed if not updated (but without anyone getting bans for it). So please update your levels if needed.
- Added new report options to report levels and users: Asking for Tips.
- Fixed some crashes.

- Added support for tipping the creator of a level!
- Levels can now be filtered by difficulty!
- The "Random" button will now only add levels with the selected difficulty.
- Fixed T-Posing on ice giving a lot of extra speed.

- Added support for tipping the creator of a level!
- Levels can now be filtered by difficulty!
- The "Random" button will now only add levels with the selected difficulty.
- Fixed T-Posing on ice giving a lot of extra speed.

- Fixed T-Posing.
- Performance improvements.
- The item lists will now show the objects you already own at the top, making it easier to find and equip them.
- The shop will now hide packs on the front page if you already own them (unless you own all of them) and show packs you don't own instead.

- Fixed T-Posing.
- Performance improvements.
- The item lists will now show the objects you already own at the top, making it easier to find and equip them.
- The shop will now hide packs on the front page if you already own them (unless you own all of them) and show packs you don't own instead.

- Fixed T-Posing.
- Performance improvements.
- The item lists will now show the objects you already own at the top, making it easier to find and equip them.
- The shop will now hide packs on the front page if you already own them (unless you own all of them) and show packs you don't own instead.

- Changed wording in the main menu.
- Removed "Next Level" button when in the tutorial.
- Tweaked the pilot head.

- Changed wording in the main menu.
- Removed "Next Level" button when in the tutorial.
- Tweaked the pilot head.

- New Lobbby!
- New cosmetics pack!
- The shop will no longer show items if their timer runs out unless you own them.
- Added some tracking of button clicks and basic interactions in the tutorial when playing for the first time to improve the game for new players in the future.

- Santa reached out to me, expressing a rather urgent concern that Christmas might be at risk of cancellation should I not revert the textures to their original state. It seems that their calendar is uniquely tailored to count only the days leading up to Christmas, leaving them oblivious to the concept of April Fools' Day. Considering the gravity of the situation, I concluded that heeding Santa's advice would be the wisest course of action.

- Fixed a crash that could happen when reporting a level.
- Changed the color block texture to be more neutral.
- After a lot of careful consideration I decided that it's best to switch back to the old textures.

- More crash fixes.
- The game now shows the server error if publishing a level fails, indicating the reason.
- Removed "Low Effort" level report option.
- When trying to publish a level the server now checks the level for profanity and complexity (minimum is 10!).
- Please let me know if you run into cases that the server prevents even though they should be fine!

- New time limited easter checkpoint.
- 5 eggs have been hidden in the lobby, each one is worth 10 coins!
- Fixed a crash that prevented some players from playing.

- New time limited easter checkpoint.
- 5 eggs have been hidden in the lobby, each one is worth 10 coins!
- Fixed a crash that prevented some players from playing.

- Added GRAB Coins!
- Updated the store layout, giving a bit more visibility to cosmetic packs.
- You can now claim 50 GRAB Coins for free every week!
- Added occlusion culling for all levels (but not in the editor yet) to improve performance in some cases.

- Added GRAB Coins!
- Updated the store layout, giving a bit more visibility to cosmetic packs.
- You can now claim 50 GRAB Coins for free every week!
- Added occlusion culling for all levels (but not in the editor yet) to improve performance in some cases.

- Animation tools are now available for everyone! (You may encounter weird or missing collisions if things move fast, expect glitches to be fixed in the future and please don't rely on them for your levels!)

- New Lobby.
- New wild west cosmetics pack.
- Made getting crushed by animated blocks more reliable.
- Changed networked data layout to better handle changes to animations.

- Improved collision behavior between fast moving player and static objects.
- The calculation of how far down you have to fall to respawn now accounts for animations.
- Fixed in-game music not playing.
- Fixed creating a checkpoint with the thumbstick not updating the number of checkpoints in the pause menu if it was opened.
- Fixed a crash that could happen when adding your favorite levels to the playlist.
- Fixed a crash that could happen if due to connection errors cosmetics data failed loading.
- Disabled snow particles in the main menu.
